28struct entity // persistent map entity
29{
30 vec o; // position
31 short attr1, attr2, attr3, attr4, attr5; // attributes
32 uchar type; // type is one of the above
33 uchar reserved;
34};
35
36enum
37{
38 EntFlag_NoVis = 1<<0,
39 EntFlag_NoShadow = 1<<1,
40 EntFlag_NoCollide = 1<<2,
41 EntFlag_Anim = 1<<3,
42 EntFlag_ShadowMesh = 1<<4,
43 EntFlag_Octa = 1<<5,
44 EntFlag_Render = 1<<6,
45 EntFlag_Sound = 1<<7,
46 EntFlag_Spawned = 1<<8,
47
48};
49
50struct extentity : entity // part of the entity that doesn't get saved to disk
51{
52 int flags;
53 extentity *attached;
54
55 extentity() : flags(0), attached(nullptr) {}
56
57 bool spawned() const
58 {
59 return (flags&EntFlag_Spawned) != 0;
60 }
61
62 void setspawned(bool val)
63 {
64 if(val)
65 {
66 flags |= EntFlag_Spawned;
67 }
68 else
69 {
70 flags &= ~EntFlag_Spawned;
71 }
72 }
73
74 void setspawned()
75 {
76 flags |= EntFlag_Spawned;
77 }
78
79 void clearspawned()
80 {
81 flags &= ~EntFlag_Spawned;
82 }
83};

126const int crouchtime = 200;
127const float crouchheight = 0.75f;
128
129struct physent // base entity type, can be affected by physics
130{
131 vec o, vel, falling; // origin, velocity
132 vec deltapos, newpos; // movement interpolation
133 float yaw, pitch, roll;
134 float maxspeed; // cubes per second, 50 for player
135 int timeinair;
136 float radius, eyeheight, maxheight, aboveeye; // bounding box size
137 float xradius, yradius, zmargin;
138 vec floor; // the normal of floor the dynent is on
139
140 int inwater;
141 bool jumping;
142 char move, strafe, crouching;
143
144 uchar physstate; // one of PHYS_* above
145 uchar state, editstate; // one of CS_* above
146 uchar type; // one of ENT_* above
147 uchar collidetype; // one of COLLIDE_* above
148
149 bool blocked; // used by physics to signal ai
150
151 physent() : o(0, 0, 0), deltapos(0, 0, 0), newpos(0, 0, 0), yaw(0), pitch(0), roll(0), maxspeed(35),
152 radius(4.0f), eyeheight(14), maxheight(15), aboveeye(2), xradius(4.1f), yradius(4.1f), zmargin(0),
153 state(ClientState_Alive), editstate(ClientState_Alive), type(PhysEnt_Player),
154 collidetype(Collide_Ellipse),
155 blocked(false)
156 { reset(); }
157
158 void resetinterp()
159 {
160 newpos = o;
161 deltapos = vec(0, 0, 0);
162 }
163
164 void reset()
165 {
166 inwater = 0;
167 timeinair = 0;
168 eyeheight = maxheight;
169 jumping = false;
170 strafe = move = crouching = 0;
171 physstate = PhysEntState_Fall;
172 vel = falling = vec(0, 0, 0);
173 floor = vec(0, 0, 1);
174 }
175
176 vec feetpos(float offset = 0) const
177 {
178 return vec(o).addz(offset - eyeheight);
179 }
180 vec headpos(float offset = 0) const
181 {
182 return vec(o).addz(offset);
183 }
184
185 bool crouched() const
186 {
187 return fabs(eyeheight - maxheight*crouchheight) < 1e-4f;
188 }
189};
190
191enum
192{
193 Anim_Mapmodel = 0,
194 Anim_GameSpecific
195};

197enum
198{
199 Anim_All = 0x1FF,
200 Anim_Index = 0x1FF,
201 Anim_Loop = (1 << 9),
202 Anim_Clamp = (1 << 10),
203 Anim_Reverse = (1 << 11),
204 Anim_Start = (Anim_Loop | Anim_Clamp),
205 Anim_End = (Anim_Loop | Anim_Clamp | Anim_Reverse),
206 Anim_Dir = 0xE00,
207 Anim_Secondary = 12,
208 Anim_Reuse = 0xFFFFFF,
209 Anim_NoSkin = (1 << 24),
210 Anim_SetTime = (1 << 25),
211 Anim_FullBright = (1 << 26),
212 Anim_NoRender = (1 << 27),
213 Anim_Ragdoll = (1 << 28),
214 Anim_SetSpeed = (1 << 29),
215 Anim_NoPitch = (1 << 30),
216 Anim_Flags = 0xFF000000,
217};
218
219struct animinfo // description of a character's animation
220{
221 int anim, frame, range, basetime;
222 float speed;
223 uint varseed;
224
225 animinfo() : anim(0), frame(0), range(0), basetime(0), speed(100.0f), varseed(0) { }
226
227 bool operator==(const animinfo &o) const
228 {
229 return frame==o.frame && range==o.range && (anim&(Anim_SetTime | Anim_Dir)) == (o.anim & (Anim_SetTime | Anim_Dir)) && (anim & Anim_SetTime || basetime == o.basetime) && speed == o.speed;
230 }
231 bool operator!=(const animinfo &o) const
232 {
233 return frame!=o.frame || range!=o.range || (anim&(Anim_SetTime | Anim_Dir)) != (o.anim & (Anim_SetTime | Anim_Dir)) || (!(anim & Anim_SetTime) && basetime != o.basetime) || speed != o.speed;
234 }
235};
236
237struct animinterpinfo // used for animation blending of animated characters
238{
239 animinfo prev, cur;
240 int lastswitch;
241 void *lastmodel;
242
243 animinterpinfo() : lastswitch(-1), lastmodel(nullptr) {}
244
245 void reset() { lastswitch = -1; }
246};
247
248const int maxanimparts = 3;
249
250struct occludequery;
251class ragdolldata;
252
253struct dynent : physent // animated characters, or characters that can receive input
254{
255 bool k_left, k_right, k_up, k_down; // see input code
256
257 animinterpinfo animinterp[maxanimparts];
258 ragdolldata *ragdoll;
259 occludequery *query;
260 int lastrendered;
261
262 dynent() : ragdoll(nullptr), query(nullptr), lastrendered(0)
263 {
264 reset();
265 }
266
267 ~dynent()
268 {
269 extern void cleanragdoll(dynent *d);
270 if(ragdoll)
271 {
272 cleanragdoll(this);
273 }
274 }
275
276 void stopmoving()
277 {
278 k_left = k_right = k_up = k_down = jumping = false;
279 move = strafe = crouching = 0;
280 }
281
282 void reset()
283 {
284 physent::reset();
285 stopmoving();
286 for(int i = 0; i < maxanimparts; ++i)
287 {
288 animinterp[i].reset();
289 }
290 }
291
292 vec abovehead()
293 {
294 return vec(o).addz(aboveeye+4);
295 }
296};
297
298#endif /* ENTS_H_ */
cleanragdoll
void cleanragdoll(dynent *d)
Deletes the ragdoll associated with the passed dynent.
